default-checked.description_zh: 默认选中状态（非受控状态）

loading.description: Whether it is in the Loading state

checked-color.description: The color of the switch when selected

unchecked-color.description: The color of the switch when it is unchecked

:before-change.type: ( newValue: string | number | boolean) => Promise<boolean | void> | boolean | void
:before-change.description: The hook before the switch state is changed, returns false or returns a Promise and is rejected to stop the switch.
:before-change.description_zh: switch 状态改变前的钩子， 返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject 则停止切换。

checked-text.description: Copywriting when it is open (does not take effect when type='line' and size='small')
checked-text.description_zh: 打开状态时的文案（type='line'和size='small'时不生效）

unchecked-text.description: Closed copy (not effective when type='line' and size='small')
unchecked-text.description_zh: 关闭状态时的文案（type='line'和size='small'时不生效）

events.name: change
events.params: value: boolean | string | number, ev: Event

events.name: focus
events.description: Triggers when a component gains focus

events.name: blur
events.description: Triggers when a component loses focus

slots.name: checked-icon
slots.description: 打开状态时，按钮上的图标
slots.description_zh: 打开状态时，按钮上的图标

slots.name: unchecked-icon
slots.description: 关闭状态时，按钮上的图标
slots.description_zh: 关闭状态时，按钮上的图标

slots.name: checked
slots.description: 打开状态时的文案（type='line'和size='small'时不生效）
slots.description_zh: 打开状态时的文案（type='line'和size='small'时不生效）

slots.name: unchecked
slots.description: 关闭状态时的文案（type='line'和size='small'时不生效）
slots.description_zh: 关闭状态时的文案（type='line'和size='small'时不生效）
